https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3p8nZAGiw8LT8TFpYOn7uoTUdvI.jpg In August 1950, waiting for UN troops to arrive, the South Korean army assembled to protect Nakdong River. Only 71 student-soldiers are left behind to guard the city of Pohang. Now they are on a mission to defend the country from North Korean troops. 71: Into the Fire
